patthana15.81:1.1: Araṇaṃ parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.81:2.1: Araṇaṃ mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.81:3.1: Araṇaṃ appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
